name: WAGONPUNK
description:
Wagonpunk is a game about robot cowboys - long after all the humans have blown each other up, rusty machines forge onwards, slowly returning the newly sun-bleached and irradiated earth to something resembling the american west.

Wagonpunk is in open development. If you like what you see, or have a suggestion, leave a comment below. If you want to donate, visit paypal.me/gazornonplat

♡

Changelog:

17/09/16 - greatly improved view model and animations, a map (hold tab to view), bullet tracers, more sound effects, and some optimization

15/09/16 - added more sound effects, a ricochet system, some music, and tweaked physical attributes of certain props

13/09/16 - uploaded the very first public build of the game
